projects.title: Extreme
projects.subtitle: Rover control GUI
projects.description: By connecting with robots via serial connection, robots can be easily operated. This application makes the control of remote device very easy. This GUI is used in mongol-tori for controlling and navigating the rover.

projects.description: A software application that provides a user-friendly interface for interacting with sensors and visualizing the data they collect.

projects.title: Bus Ticket

projects.description: An application designed to streamline and simplify the process of booking, purchasing, and managing bus tickets for travelers.

projects.title: Traffic Analysis
projects.subtitle: Crowd source based traffic analysis
projects.description: It provides a convenient and efficient way for passengers to plan their journeys, select routes, and access essential travel information

projects.title: Interceptor
projects.subtitle: Remote-controlled combat-oriented robots
projects.description: It includes robot design, remote operation, and tactical decision-making, showcasing a passion for robotics and a drive for competition.

recent_projects.title: AIDRR
recent_projects.subtitle: AI based disaster risk reduction.
recent_projects.description: A novel hybrid AI approach for fire and smoke detection. Traditional CCTV based vision approach is used in mitigating the risks of two of the most common incidents in Bangladesh. Detect early fire incidents and reduce response time. GSM based hardware to trigger manually and warning generation with verification. IoT-based call point is an additional layer notifying the authorities.

recent_projects.title: faunadb-nestjs
recent_projects.subtitle: Reusable NestJs package for Fauna dB connection.

recent_projects.title: use-file-upload-s3
recent_projects.subtitle: React hooks library to add dynamic functionality to s3 file uploads into your react application.
